alert.note: Alert for Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 03 at 3:00PM CST until January 05 at 6:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible...Total snow accumulations between 3 and 6 inches possible. Locally higher totals exceeding 6 inches possible. Wind gusts up to 30 mph during the day could also produce drifting snow. * WHERE...Vilas County. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
